title: Push Notification
description: Create a push server to manage and notify subscribed clients (Smart phone and Desktop). Provide APIs for 3rd parties applications to manage subscribers and push messages. We will use this push server to notify changes from SVN, tasks in Ivy... anything we want.

featureset.title: Push server
featureset.description:
Subscriber manager

  • Register new subscriber
  • Query subscribers by group (token, tag...)

Notifier

  • Send push request to GCM (Google Cloud Messaging) server

featureset.title: SVN change notification
featureset.description: Poll, detect changes and call Push API

features.title: New push message on smart phone
